item.description:
Come join us for some fun canoeing or kayaking on the Charles River in Newton. We will rent boats from Charles River Canoe and Kayak. We usually have 2 to 3 in a canoe. The Kayaks fit one or two individuals. All levels are welcome. And it is your choice to canoe or to kayak.

Cost: Approximately $8 - $10/person.

We do have some groupons which enables us to keep the cost low.

Here are directions to their Newton location:[url=http://www.paddleboston.com/newton/directions.php]http://www.paddleboston.com/newton/directions.php[/url]

Dinner afterwards will be at Le's at the Atrium Mall in Chestnut Hill. It's on Level 1 of the mall. 300 Boylston Street Chestnut Hill, MA 02467

We hope you can make it! The weather looks good for Saturday.

PS - Transportation is your own responsibility. However, if you need a ride, please note where you are located or which T stop you can meet at. Our members are very good about offering rides if they can.

We can also arrange to pick people up at a Newton T stop (Woodland - D line).
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet outside the entrance

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Canoeing/Kayaking on the Charles (Newton)
